name: Vishnu Prasad Korada
about:
Hello I am Vishnu Prasad Korada, pursuing Computer Science Engineering in GIETU
I am a CSE sophmore specializing in AI/ML. I know Python, Java , HTML , CSS , JavaScript. I also know Graphic Designing and have used this skill in University Practically .
 Apart from that sketching, playing my piano and researching about space exploration are some of my favourite hobbies...
